title: Spatio-Temporal Fluid Dynamics Modeling via Physical-Awareness and Parameter Diffusion Guidance
abstract: arXiv:2403.13850v1 Announce Type: cross  Abstract: This paper proposes a two-stage framework named ST-PAD for spatio-temporal fluid dynamics modeling in the field of earth sciences, aiming to achieve high-precision simulation and prediction of fluid dynamics through spatio-temporal physics awareness and parameter diffusion guidance. In the upstream stage, we design a vector quantization reconstruction module with temporal evolution characteristics, ensuring balanced and resilient parameter distribution by introducing general physical constraints. In the downstream stage, a diffusion probability network involving parameters is utilized to generate high-quality future states of fluids, while enhancing the model's generalization ability by perceiving parameters in various physical setups. translated_title: 经过物理意识和参数扩散指导的时空流体动力学建模
translated_abstract: 本文提出了一种名为ST-PAD的两阶段框架，用于地球科学领域的时空流体动力学建模，旨在通过时空物理学意识和参数扩散引导实现流体动力学的高精度仿真和预测。在上游阶段，我们设计了一个具有时间演变特性的矢量量化重构模块，通过引入一般的物理约束，确保了平衡和有弹性的参数分布。在下游阶段，利用涉及参数的扩散概率网络来生成高质量的未来流体状态，同时通过感知不同物理设置中的参数，增强模型的泛化能力。对多个基准数据集进行的大量实验验证了ST-PAD框架的有效性和鲁棒性，显示ST-PAD在流体动力学方面优于当前主流模型。
tldr: 该论文提出了ST-PAD框架，通过时空物理学意识和参数扩散引导实现流体动力学的高精度仿真和预测，在多个基准数据集上的实验证明其优于当前主流模型
en_tdlr: This paper introduces the ST-PAD framework for high-precision simulation and prediction of fluid dynamics through spatio-temporal physics awareness and parameter diffusion guidance, which outperforms current mainstream models in fluid dynamics on multiple benchmark datasets.
